Title: Relates to aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate or a defendant
Summary: Provides that a courtroom or waiting area shall be a facility for purposes of aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate or a defendant.
LawCode: Amd ยง240.32, add ยง240.33, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate or by a defendant
